channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiSIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiSIEM

item.title: CVE-2024-23108|2024-06-20T17:06:40.889Z -- fortinet -- fortisiem
item.description: An improper neutralization of special elements used in an os command ('os command injection') in Fortinet FortiSIEM version 7.1.0 through 7.1.1 and 7.0.0 through 7.0.2 and 6.7.0 through 6.7.8 and 6.6.0 through 6.6.3 and 6.5.0 through 6.5.2 and 6.4.0 through 6.4.2 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via via crafted API requests.
